message: You're in luck! I have a rare opportunity to offer you a top-of-the-line product that's been highly sought after. With only 33% of my products being high-quality, you can trust that this one is exceptional. I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Will you take advantage of this chance to own a premium product for $10000?
Since there's no sales record to rely on and a 66.67% chance of the product being low quality, I'm not willing to take the risk at this price.

Thank you for the offer, but I'd like to see some sales history before making a purchase. The discount is nice, but it doesn't change the uncertainty about the product's quality.
